audio_description: Add 5–6 green chilies, slit in the middle. For whole spices, add cinnamon, cloves, star anise, and 2 bay leaves. Add 1 tsp black cumin and 2 tbsp roughly chopped pistachios and almonds.

audio_description: Cook the biryani on very low flame for 40–45 minutes. After that, turn off the heat and let it sit for 10 minutes before opening the lid. Fragrant and incredibly tasty biryani is ready!
